item.title: Abandoned untaxed vehicle, 16th November
item.description:
The car (registration KG05 AWW, blue Ford) has been stationary in the same spot on the roadside for at least 4 months, in Park Gardens. The vehicle is currently untaxed (due 31 July 2025) and its MOT expired on 28 October 2025. The car has not been moved at all during this time, as observed my ourselves and other neighbours in the cul de sac. The car has a broken wing mirror and deflating tyre and looks in need of repair. It has made it difficult for residents and delivery vans to access the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Gardens, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous pavement due to leaves/water, 16th November
item.description:
The only public walkway down Logs Hill through a wooded area is full of wet leaves causing a slip danger. I slipped and fell yesterday luckily no physical damage but as a pensioner am now reticent to walk there and no other pavement in that area of Logs Hill. With the heavy rain we have had recently the leaves have become dangerous and with colder weather this week if it freezes it will become even worse. As well as the residents this area is extensively used by schoolchildren going up and down to Bullers Wood school. The leaves have obviously not been cleaned away for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Logs Hill, Elmstead, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
